channel.title: 4 questions
channel.description:
q1
how do i make the ice barraga hit multiple targets q2 when i use a staff lets say air staff how do i make it auto cast,, how do i make the autcast work so i can choose out of all spells .. not ancient but normals.
q3 how do i fix the stairs
q4 what is the case of the alkharid gate?

item.title: 4 questions
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(40); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

this is the code of the ice barrage spell but i dont see the mutiple square hits
or should it be added to it/

Read full topic

item.title: 4 questions
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Your question number one.
You need to change the tiles of the amount of npc spaces it hits.

Your question number two.
I don’t know, there is a tutorial on it in the correct section.

Your question number three.
You need to add a case. Then find the bottom of the stairs and the top. Then you need to add a teleport to each coordinate.

Your question number four.
Right click on the gate. Search for the gate identification. If not you must add the case.

Read full topic
